caption.title: (A) and (B) Normalized populations over 20 years of historic data (1993 through 2013) for Hillsborough, Florida and Fraser Valley, British Columbia respectively.
caption.p: The dashed line indicates the mean annual population while the bold-solid line indicates the population for the mean temperatures across all years. (C) and (D) illustrate the daily temperature data for all years and the mean daily temperatures across all years for Hillsborough, Florida and Fraser Valley, British Columbia respectively.
